summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting an Easement over portions of 39th Place Northeast as vacated by Ordinance 110564 for storm drain purposes, accepting a Quit Claim Deed to a portion of Block 3, Spring Brook Terrace Addition and of a portion of 39th Avenue Northeast as vacated by Ordinance 59238 for street purposes and laying off Northeast 45th Street and Sand Point Way Northeast. (Street Vacation 39th Place Northeast; RW 8005).
